thread.title: Watch: Man with the best laugh ever plays virtual reality horror game, everyone wins
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Man with the best laugh ever plays virtual reality horror game, everyone wins - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Watch: Man with the best laugh ever plays virtual reality horror game, everyone wins
text:
We don't know what it is about other people's fear that is so entertaining but we're not going to question it.
We're also really glad that when Anthony Smith got his friend Jason to play a virtual reality Insidious game that he decided to record the whole thing.
Now if someone can just invent a virtual reality game where we watch people being hilariously terrified by horror games, that would just be great.
Via YouTube
